menu.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
menu.description: A fresh mix of lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and grilled chicken breast, topped with a light vinaigrette dressing.

menu.name: Beef Burger
menu.description: Juicy beef patty served with lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, and a side of crispy fries.

menu.name: Vegetarian Pizza
menu.description: A thin-crust pizza topped with mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives.

menu.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
menu.description: Classic Italian pasta with a rich and savory ground beef tomato sauce.

menu.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
menu.description: Stir-fried chicken with mixed vegetables served over a bed of rice.

menu.name: Mango Smoothie
menu.description: A refreshing smoothie made with fresh mangoes, yogurt, and a touch of honey.
